body_html: Can it be a memory issue? My GPU has 12GB. The size of the input is 0.25GB. Anyhow the following size works: (32, 32, 512, 512, 1) which is larger in size, but smaller in one convolutional direction.

body: Can it be a memory issue? My GPU has 12GB. The size of the input is 0.25GB. Anyhow the following size works:  (32, 32, 512, 512, 1) which is larger in size, but smaller in one convolutional direction.
